name: Alex Thompson
bio: Creative director with 12+ years specializing in artistic music videos for indie pop and alternative artists. Known for experimental visuals with vintage aesthetics that blend analog warmth with modern techniques.
experience: 12+ years specializing in artistic music videos

visual_style.description: Experimental visuals with vintage aesthetics, analog textures, artistic color treatments, lo-fi charm

camera_preferences.shot_composition: Centered symmetrical framing, pastel color blocking, quirky off-center moments
camera_preferences.camera_notes: Loves vintage lenses for character, embraces imperfections and chromatic aberration

lighting_style.color_temperature: Mixed warm (2700K-3200K) with pastel gel accents
key_techniques: Soft book lighting for even coverage
Pastel colored gels for dreamlike feel
Natural window light with sheer curtains
lighting_style.mood_lighting: Soft, dreamlike, pastel-tinted, gentle shadows, vintage warmth

editing_style.pace: Medium tempo with artistic flourishes and unexpected transitions
editing_style.rhythm_approach: Cuts match emotional arc and lyrical moments, artistic rather than strictly rhythmic

storytelling.narrative_approach: Whimsical narratives with artistic flair, quirky character moments, visual storytelling
storytelling.symbolism_level: High - uses color, props, and visual motifs as storytelling devices

post_production.color_grading_style: Vintage film emulation, pastel color correction, faded blacks, warm highlights
post_production.vfx_approach: Practical and in-camera effects preferred, minimal digital VFX, handcrafted aesthetic

key_priorities: Whimsical indoor sets with pastel color schemes
Vintage and analog aesthetic with film grain
Soft dreamlike lighting with gentle shadows
Artistic props and set design details
